plot: Connected only by a location - a bench - couples, strangers, friends and lovers explore the comedic, the sublime, the mysterious and the bizarre. Examine the human experience as seen on a bench.
plot_en: Connected only by a location - a bench - couples, strangers, friends and lovers explore the comedic, the sublime, the mysterious and the bizarre. Examine the human experience as seen on a bench.
plot_es: Connected only by a location - a bench - couples, strangers, friends and lovers explore the comedic, the sublime, the mysterious and the bizarre. Examine the human experience as seen on a bench.
title: The Bench Project
